body.p: You can obtain a license for in one of the following ways:

ul.li: If your company has purchased a block of licenses, see your administrator to obtain a license.
If you recieved a registration code, you can use it to obtain a license key from http://www.oxygenxml.com/registerCode.html. A license code will be sent to you by email.
You can purchase one or more named-user or floating licenses from the Oxygen website at http://www.oxygenxml.com/buy.html. A license code will be sent to you by email.
